description.narrative: Relevant government ministries at national and sub-national levels have increased capacity and commitment to manage equitable and sustainable WASH programmes

sector.narrative: WASH - Enabling environment (policies/strategies, coordination, regulation, financing, planning-monitoring-review, sector capacity development and professionalization)

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Relevant government ministries at national and sub-national levels have increased capacity and commitment to manage equitable and sustainable WASH programmes

description.narrative: UNICEF continues supporting the WASH sector on a comprehensive scale through times of stability and crisis. This includes providing upstream strategic support and programme implementation support both at national and sub-national levels. The intensive engagement has helped build functional capacities of key sector ministries to scale up WASH sector results. | Status:Constrained | As-of Date:30/06/2020

title.narrative: Number of people accessing a sustainable drinking water service in the reporting year only
Number of programmes actively integrated Climate Change component

actual.value: 2020:WASH is actively engaged, while Health, Nutrition and Education are starting.

title.narrative: Capacity development plan developed and adapted suiting MRRD's specific needs at national and sub-national level

baseline.value: No Capacity Development plan developed and adapted

actual.value: 2020:Capacity assessment completed. Capacity development plan yet to be developed.

title.narrative: National and subnational water safety framework in place
Existence of a strengthened system for climate change programming - A Climate Change and Urban Programming Taskforce in place

target.value: 2020:Yes - A Climate Change and Urban Programming Taskforce in place and meets regularly and oversee the implementation of various climate change strategies across the sections

title.narrative: National Sanitation & Hygiene Strategies and costed Sector Plans for Afghanistan developed

actual.value: 2020:ToR was developed, position for consultant advertised, a consultant selected but due to COVID 19 the process has been put on hold
